com.datamelt.rules.core.action

Class DateAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.datamelt.rules.core.action.DateAction

  • public class DateAction
extends java.lang.Object
    Class containing possible actions that are related to dates. Actions belong to a rulegroup and are execute depending on the status of rulegroup - if it passed or failed (or both).
    Author:
    uwe geercken

      • setTodayDate

        public java.lang.String setTodayDate(XmlAction action,
                                     java.lang.String dateFormat)
        method will set the value of the relevant object to the current date. the dateFormat parameter is used to specify the date format according to the specification defined in the SimpleDateFormat class.
        Parameters:
        action - the action to use
        dateFormat - the format to use for the date
        Returns:
        the date as a string in the default format

      • setTodayDate

        public java.lang.String setTodayDate(XmlAction action,
                                     java.lang.String dateFormat,
                                     int daysOffset)
        method will set the value of the relevant object to the current date plus/minus the specified number of days offset. the dateFormat parameter is used to specify the date format according to the specification defined in the SimpleDateFormat class.
        Parameters:
        action - the action to use
        dateFormat - the format to use for the date
        daysOffset - the number of days offset from today
        Returns:
        todays date in the given format as a string

      • setLastDayOfMonth

        public java.lang.String setLastDayOfMonth(XmlAction action,
                                          int year,
                                          int month)
        method will set the value of the relevant object to the date of the last day of the month. The default date format will be used to format the returned string
        Parameters:
        action - the action to use
        year - the year used for calculation
        month - the month used for calculation
        Returns:
        todays date in the default format as a string
